name: Cream Dory Beet Pesto Pasta
description: Indulge in a healthy yet hearty meal with our Cream Dory Beet Pesto Pasta. This recipe is perfect for those looking for low-sugar, nutritious options without compromising on taste. Packed with fresh vegetables, seasoned Cream Dory, and a unique beet pesto, it's a healthy twist on a classic pasta dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Begin by rinsing the Cream Dory under cold water and pat dry with paper towels.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the Cream Dory into strips, season as desired and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and dice the carrot, slice the Shitake mushrooms, and cut the young baby corn into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the cloves and fresh basil leaves, dice the tomatoes, and peel and chop the beets.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan over medium heat, cook the diced beet until soft, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cooked beets to a blender along with the chopped basil, tomatoes, and cloves. Blend until smooth to create the beet pesto sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: In a separate pan, heat a bit of oil and lightly sauté the carrot, shitake mushrooms, and baby corn until tender, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Add the Cream Dory strips to the pan with the vegetables and cook until the fish is done, about 7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the sautéed vegetables, Cream Dory, and beet pesto sauce. Toss with your favorite cooked pasta.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
